channel.title: Mentions at Europe LinuxCon
channel.description:
FYI: Joanna (Qubes founder) and Marek (Qubes developer) mentioned our Qubes + Whonix work in their presentations at the Europe LinuxCon in Düsseldorf, Germany. http://www.invisiblethingslab.com/resources/2014/LinuxCon_2014_Qubes_Keynote.pdf Page 33 of 37:
Qubes as a platform for secure/privacy-oriented Apps • Integration with Tor • TorVM since 2012 • Currently on-going work to fully integrate Whonix
http://www.invisiblethingslab.com/resources/2014/LinuxCon_2014_Qubes_Tutorial.pdf Page 29 of 79:
Digression on using TorVM in Qubes OS - TorVM cannot (obviously) anonymize anything beyond IP/MAC - Use e.g. TBB or Whonix workstation in/as clients of TorVM
A big thanks to them both for their ongoing support! :D

item.title: Mentions at Europe LinuxCon
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
FYI:

Joanna (Qubes founder) and Marek (Qubes developer) mentioned our Qubes + Whonix work in their presentations at the Europe LinuxCon in Düsseldorf, Germany.

invisiblethingslab.com

LinuxCon_2014_Qubes_Keynote.pdf

4.05 MB

Page 33 of 37:

Qubes as a platform for secure/privacy-oriented Apps • Integration with Tor • TorVM since 2012 • Currently on-going work to fully integrate Whonix
invisiblethingslab.com

LinuxCon_2014_Qubes_Tutorial.pdf

3.25 MB

Page 29 of 79:

Digression on using TorVM in Qubes OS - TorVM cannot (obviously) anonymize anything beyond IP/MAC - Use e.g. TBB or Whonix workstation in/as clients of TorVM

A big thanks to them both for their ongoing support!

Read full topic
